entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:28 AM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 2:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
